job_description:
• Ability to establish and maintain project ownership from inception to integration & proliferation The ability to manage multiple tasks concurrently and drive them to a timely conclusion Ability to analyze technical data, draw conclusions and present technical reports Experience in leadership or project management with multi-functional teams Bachelor's Degree in Mechanical Engineering or related technical field.
• High degree of self-initiative with an ability to think independently Excellent verbal and written communication and presentation skills Experience with equipment maintenance and troubleshooting Experience with 3D CAD modeling software Experience with supplier management.
